a1bdGhXJRdZ3SFTBGSPUsc"]}},"version":1}

params._forwardTimestampLimit: Until which epoch (provided as timestamp) should the update be applied. If it is higher than the current epoch timestamp, this will be used.
Until which epoch (provided as timestamp) should the update be applied. If it is higher than the current epoch timestamp, this will be used.

params._claimFromTimestamp: From which epoch (provided as timestmap) should the claim start. Usually, this parameter should be set to 0, in which case the epoch of the last claim will be used.     However, it can be useful to skip certain epochs, e.g. when the balance was very low or 0 (after everything was withdrawn) and the gas usage should be reduced.     Note that all rewards are forfeited forever if epochs are explicitly skipped by providing this parameter
params._claimUpToTimestamp: Until which epoch (provided as timestamp) should the claim be applied. If it is higher than the timestamp of the previous epoch, this will be used     Set to type(uint256).max to claim all possible epochs

params._fromEpoch: From which epoch (provided as timestamp) to set the rewards from
params._toEpoch: Until which epoch (provided as timestamp) to set the rewards to

params._delta: The amount of cNote deposited (positive) or withdrawn (negative)

params._isWhiteListed: Whether the market is whitelisted or not
params._market: Address of the market to whitelist

checkpoint_market(address,uint256).notice: Trigger a checkpoint explicitly.     Never needs to be called explicitly, but could be used to ensure the checkpoints within the other functions consume less gas (because they need to forward less epochs)

claim(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Claim the CANTO for a given market. Can only be performed for prior (i.e. finished) epochs, not the current one

setRewards(uint256,uint256,uint248).notice: Used by governance to set the overall CANTO rewards per epoch

sync_ledger(address,int256).notice: Function that is called by the lending market on cNOTE deposits / withdrawals

whiteListLendingMarket(address,bool).notice: Used by governance to whitelist a lending market

documentation.text:
@notice Check that a provided timestamp is a valid epoch (divisible by WEEK) or infinity
 @param _timestamp Timestamp to check

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "No deposits for this lender in this market"

arguments.value: No deposits for this lender in this market

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "No deposits for this lender in this market"
